channel.title: Add Name Frame + Using It
channel.description:
Hey.
Recently I've been trying to get the frame that looks like "Add Name" on the friends list when you click on the 'Add Friend' button, but i've been having problems.
I get the frame to open up, and whenever I submit something to it my server goes wild. It starts to parse random packets that weren't sent (without me knowing, of course), and just disconnects me. The frame for this is 187.
My question is how to control it, and use the submitted info. Let's say I type in 'bob' into the frame that pops up, and click enter. I then want to parse that string ('bob') and use it in anyway I want to.
So if anybody knows where to start, or how to resolve this problem, that'd be great.
Thanks in advance. TeleNubby.

item.title: Add Name Frame + Using It
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:4, topic:150586”]So basicly, when you enter “bob” and hit enter, it screws up and disconnects you.

Freinds list works off user IDs ( no duh ) and when you enter “bob” there is no ID for it, thus screwing crap up, maybe you could make the add freinds look for a player named bob, and parse the user ID?

Just an idea =[/quote]True but im using the frame, not actually the tab.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Name Frame + Using It
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

So basicly, when you enter “bob” and hit enter, it screws up and disconnects you.

Freinds list works off user IDs ( no duh ) and when you enter “bob” there is no ID for it, thus screwing crap up, maybe you could make the add freinds look for a player named bob, and parse the user ID?

Just an idea =\

item.title: Add Name Frame + Using It
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Hey.

Recently I’ve been trying to get the frame that looks like “Add Name” on the friends list when you click on the ‘Add Friend’ button, but i’ve been having problems.

I get the frame to open up, and whenever I submit something to it my server goes wild. It starts to parse random packets that weren’t sent (without me knowing, of course), and just disconnects me. The frame for this is 187.

My question is how to control it, and use the submitted info. Let’s say I type in ‘bob’ into the frame that pops up, and click enter. I then want to parse that string (‘bob’) and use it in anyway I want to.

So if anybody knows where to start, or how to resolve this problem, that’d be great.

Thanks in advance.
TeleNubby.

Read full topic
